thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Doris
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Doris

author: Doris
title: Doris
text: We love Omega service and the car you provided. But as we returned the car around 4am to the Airpark, the attitude of the lady at the reception was really offensive. While I was returning the car key, she asked me, "where is you car parked?" But I didn't understand it for a minute. (I'm Asian.) she repeated it with really insulting expression on her face.
